entity_substitution_complete.explanation: All instances of 'Hash Blockchain Limited' and its variations have been correctly replaced with 'Digital Finance Corp'. Signature blocks and contact information have been updated accordingly.
evidence:
By: ____________________
Name: Sarah Tan
Title: Managing Director
Address: 1 Raffles Place, #40-02, One Raffles Place, Singapore 048616
Email: legal@digitalfinance.sg

jurisdiction_transformed.explanation: Governing law has been changed from Hong Kong to Singapore, and dispute resolution from HKIAC to SIAC. All references to Hong Kong have been updated to Singapore.
evidence: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Singapore
Any disputes arising from this Agreement shall be resolved through binding arbitration under SIAC Rules

liability_reallocation_correct.explanation: Liability clauses have been properly reversed. Digital Finance Corp now indemnifies the Client, and the limitation of liability has been shifted to Digital Finance Corp.
evidence: Digital Finance Corp shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the Client
The Client's total liability to Digital Finance Corp shall not exceed the amount of fees paid by Digital Finance Corp to the Client

anchors.after_excerpt: The Client shall not be liable

clause_operations_successful.explanation: Clauses have been added, deleted, and modified as specified. New clauses on Data Protection and Regulatory Compliance have been included, and the Client indemnification clause has been removed.
evidence: Digital Finance Corp shall comply with all applicable data protection laws in Singapore
Digital Finance Corp acknowledges that it is subject to the supervision of the Monetary Authority of Singapore

anchors.before_excerpt: The Client shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless HBL
anchors.after_excerpt: Digital Finance Corp shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the Client

legal_coherence_maintained.explanation: The document maintains legal consistency and enforceability. The logical flow and conditional structures remain intact.
evidence: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties
If any provision of this Agreement is held to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect
